TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit HttpClientJsonExtensions extends System.Object
public ref class HttpClientJsonExtensions abstract sealed

summary.span: 包含要以 JSON 形式发送和接收 HTTP 内容的扩展方法。

span.span: Contains extension methods to send and receive HTTP content as JSON.

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Threading.Tasks.Task<object>? GetFromJsonAsync (this System.Net.Http.HttpClient client, string? requestUri, Type type, System.Threading.CancellationToken cancellationToken = default);

static member GetFromJsonAsync : System.Net.Http.HttpClient * string * Type * System.Threading.CancellationToken -> System.Threading.Tasks.Task<obj>

param.name: client
param.span: 用于发送请求的客户端。

span.span: The client used to send the request.

param.name: requestUri
param.span: 请求发送到的 URI。

span.span: The Uri the request is sent to.

param.name: type
param.span: 要反序列化并返回的对象的类型。

span.span: The type of the object to deserialize to and return.

param.name: cancellationToken
param.span: 可由其他对象或线程用以接收取消通知的取消标记。

span.span: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.

summary.span: 将 GET 请求发送到指定 URI，并在异步操作中以 JSON 形式返回反序列化响应正文生成的值。

span.span: Sends a GET request to the specified Uri and returns the value that results from deserializing the response body as JSON in an asynchronous operation.

returns.span: 表示异步操作的任务对象。

span.span: The task object representing the asynchronous operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法使用 用于反序列化的选项，而 反序列化方法默认情况下不使用。This method uses options for deserialization, whereas deserialization methods do not, by default.

span.span: Send a PUT request to the specified Uri containing the serialized as JSON in the request body.

returns.span: 表示异步操作的任务对象。

span.span: The task object representing the asynchronous operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法使用 用于序列化的选项，而 序列化方法默认情况下不使用。This method uses options for serialization, whereas serialization methods do not, by default.
